protocol.name: P-G3799-1
protocol.text: Seeds were germinated under 16 h light conditions without stratification.

protocol.name: P-G3799-2
protocol.text: Seeds from Arabidopsis thaliana ecotype Columbia were surface sterilized and sown on nylon membranes on Murashige and Skoog (MS) media (Murashige and Skoog, 1962) containing 0.8% agar with and without 10 mM Trichostatin A (TSA) (Sigma Chemical Co., USA) in 10 cm Petri dishes with 10 ml media/dish.  Seeds were germinated under 16 h light conditions.

protocol.name: P-G3799-4
protocol.text: Tai, H.H., Pelletier, C., Beardmore, T. (2004) Total RNA isolation from Picea marianna dry seed. Plant Molecular Biology Reporter 22: 93.

protocol.name: P-G3799-5
protocol.text: Seeds were germinated under 16 h light conditions.

protocol.name: P-G3799-6
protocol.text: Seeds from Arabidopsis thaliana ecotype Columbia were surface sterilized and sown on nylon membranes on Murashige and Skoog (MS) media (Murashige and Skoog, 1962) containing 0.8% agar with and without 10 mM Trichostatin A (TSA) (Sigma Chemical Co., USA) in 10 cm Petri dishes with 10 ml media/dish.
